name: Unjust
description:
Welcome to the city of Medocio! Where chaos reigns supreme! Take back the peace of the original Medocio by destroying all of the evil corporations!

CONTROLS:

WASD to move, SPACE to enter and exit cars, Q to punch, E to grapple(F to cancel if you are stuck on a wall), Click to shoot and R to teleport(If cheated in)!

Press H to unlock everything and gain the ability to teleport.

CREDITS:

Square Enix for some ideas

Kevin Macleod for some music

I made the rest of the music
